reviewText: Let me just say this. After watching this DVD and taking notes and drawing little sketches of the various moves and phases, I'll never be scared to be in someone's guard again. If you train any kind of grappling sports, you know exactly the weight of this statement.

The Warmaster Josh Barnett gives an excellent instruction demonstration of Erik Paulson's csw catch wrestling basics, techniques demonstrated and explained in clear precise manner, Josh shows that after he retires he has the ability to become a full time instructor with ease.
